metadata.title: CVE-2021-39885 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Stored XSS in merge request creation page in all versions of Gitlab EEstarting from 13.7 before 14.1.7, all versions starting from 14.2 before14.2.5, and all versions starting from 14.3 before 14.3.1 allows anattacker to execute arbitrary JavaScript code on the victim's behalf viamalicious approval rule names

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
